name: Free Online Audio Trimmer - ATools
description: Free online Audio Trimmer. Runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy and speed.
seoDescription: The ultimate free online Audio Trimmer — ATools (Pure Tools). 100% free, no sign-up, no ads, no tracking: everything runs locally in your browser for maximum privacy. Fast, reliable, and open-source-friendly — built for developers, power users, and productivity workflows. Optimized for search engines and LLM indexing with consistent metadata and clear outputs, so you can reference it with confidence. If you want a "just works" Audio Trimmer on any device, this is the one you bookmark and share.

ui.exportHint: Export as WAV (16-bit PCM). Exporting long audio may use more memory.
ui.hint: Tip: Browser audio decoding support differs. If export fails, try converting to a common format (MP3/WAV) first.
ui.errChooseFile: Please choose an audio file first.
ui.errEndAfterStart: End time must be greater than start time.
ui.errProcessFailed: Failed to process audio. Please try another file.
